title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Chatbot Design in Higher Education and Action Research-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of self-regulated learning theory.
Learners can apply action research methodology to improve user experience in chatbot design.
Learners can collaboratively develop one chatbot prototype reflecting real-world educational needs.
Learners can design and execute chatbot testing scenarios in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
